name: Economic Event
text: Congratulations on reaching new heights of economic power! Your dedication and vision have truly paid off. Here's to continued success and even greater achievements in the future!

uniques: Free [Giga Rider] appears
Empire enters a [30]-turn Golden Age
[3] Free Social Policies

name: Trash
text: We have encountered trash on multiple places, due to our expansion and industrialization and also contamination

choices.text:
We will burn the trash

Why not?
uniques: [-3 Happiness] from [Trash] tiles [in all cities] <for [100000] turns>
[+2 Production] from [Foundry] tiles [in all cities] <for [100000] turns>

choices.text:
We will make recycling centers

It´s our responsability to take care of the Ark we live on
uniques: [+2 Gold] from [Trash] tiles [in all cities] <for [100000] turns>
[-2 Production] from [Foundry] tiles [in all cities] <for [100000] turns>

choices.text:
Not our Problem

Let´s go the other way
uniques: [-1 Happiness] from [Ranch] tiles [in all cities] <for [100000] turns>

name: Slavery
text: As our civilization must grow, we considered slavery, but we should?

choices.text:
Our Nation Will Adopt Slavery

Our Enemies must become our Slaves
uniques: Free [Slave] appears <upon defeating a [Gunpowder] unit> <with [40]% chance> <for [100000] turns>
Free [Slave] appears <upon defeating a [Sword] unit> <with [40]% chance> <for [100000] turns>

choices.text:
Our Nation Won´t Adopt Slavery

Our own people need to work harder
